code:
classDiagram
    class BaseModel {
        -UUID id
        -DateTime createdAt
        -DateTime updatedAt
        +__init__()
        +save()
        +delete()
        +update(data)
        +to_dict() dict
    }

    class User {
        -UUID id
        -String firstName
        -String lastName
        -String email
        -String passwordHash
        -Boolean isAdmin
        -DateTime createdAt
        -DateTime updatedAt
        +register(firstName, lastName, email, password) User
        +updateProfile(data) User
        +delete() Boolean
        +authenticate(password) Boolean
        +validateEmail() Boolean
        +hashPassword(password) String
        +getOwnedPlaces() List~Place~
        +getReviews() List~Review~
        +isOwnerOf(place) Boolean
    }

    class Place {
        -UUID id
        -String title
        -Text description
        -Decimal price
        -Float latitude
        -Float longitude
        -UUID ownerId
        -List~UUID~ amenityIds
        -DateTime createdAt
        -DateTime updatedAt
        +create(data) Place
        +update(data) Place
        +delete() Boolean
        +addAmenity(amenity) Boolean
        +removeAmenity(amenity) Boolean
        +validateCoordinates() Boolean
        +validatePrice() Boolean
        +getOwner() User
        +getAmenities() List~Amenity~
        +getReviews() List~Review~
        +calculateAverageRating() Float
        +getReviewCount() Integer
    }

    class Review {
        -UUID id
        -UUID placeId
        -UUID userId
        -Integer rating
        -Text comment
        -DateTime createdAt
        -DateTime updatedAt
        +create(data) Review
        +update(data) Review
        +delete() Boolean
        +validateRating() Boolean
        +checkOwnership() Boolean
        +getPlace() Place
        +getUser() User
    }

    class Amenity {
        -UUID id
        -String name
        -Text description
        -DateTime createdAt
        -DateTime updatedAt
        +create(data) Amenity
        +update(data) Amenity
        +delete() Boolean
        +validateUniqueName() Boolean
        +listPlaces() List~Place~
    }

    class PlaceAmenity {
        -UUID placeId
        -UUID amenityId
        -DateTime createdAt
        +associate(placeId, amenityId)
        +dissociate(placeId, amenityId)
    }

    class Facade {
        -userRepository UserRepository
        -placeRepository PlaceRepository
        -reviewRepository ReviewRepository
        -amenityRepository AmenityRepository
        +registerUser(data) User
        +updateUser(userId, data) User
        +getUser(userId) User
        +deleteUser(userId) Boolean
        +createPlace(userId, data) Place
        +updatePlace(placeId, data) Place
        +getPlace(placeId) Place
        +deletePlace(placeId) Boolean
        +listPlaces(filters) List~Place~
        +addAmenityToPlace(placeId, amenityId) Boolean
        +removeAmenityFromPlace(placeId, amenityId) Boolean
        +submitReview(userId, placeId, data) Review
        +updateReview(reviewId, data) Review
        +getReview(reviewId) Review
        +deleteReview(reviewId) Boolean
        +listReviewsByPlace(placeId) List~Review~
        +createAmenity(data) Amenity
        +updateAmenity(amenityId, data) Amenity
        +getAmenity(amenityId) Amenity
        +deleteAmenity(amenityId) Boolean
        +listAmenities() List~Amenity~
    }

    class ValidationRules {
        +validateUserEmail(email) Boolean
        +validatePassword(password) Boolean
        +validateCoordinates(lat, long) Boolean
        +validatePrice(price) Boolean
        +validateRating(rating) Boolean
        +validateAmenityName(name) Boolean
        +validatePlaceTitle(title) Boolean
        +validateReviewComment(comment) Boolean
    }

    User --|> BaseModel : Inherits
    Place --|> BaseModel : Inherits
    Review --|> BaseModel : Inherits
    Amenity --|> BaseModel : Inherits

    User "1" -- "0..*" Place : owns
    User "1" -- "0..*" Review : writes
    Place "1" -- "0..*" Review : has
    Place "0..*" -- "0..*" Amenity : has/includes
    Place "1" -- "0..*" PlaceAmenity : contains
    Amenity "1" -- "0..*" PlaceAmenity : included in

    Facade --> User : manages
    Facade --> Place : manages
    Facade --> Review : manages
    Facade --> Amenity : manages
    Facade --> ValidationRules : uses

    note for User "Authentication and profile management"
    note for Place "Property listings and metadata"
    note for Review "User feedback and ratings (1-5)"
    note for Amenity "Features/services available at places"
    note for Facade "Central business logic manager"
    note for BaseModel "Base class for all entities"
    note for PlaceAmenity "Junction table for M:N relationship"
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
